EmbeddedReservation.description: Represents basic information about a reservation

_links.description: Collection of links to the full representation of the reservation and other related resources

EmbeddedRoomType.description:
Represents a short version of room type. To get the full version
            please follow the self link from the links collection.

_links.description: Collection of links to related resources.
Collection of links to related resources.

room_type.description:
Room type of the room.
            
            Contains only the basic properties of the room type.

LinkObject.description: A Link Object represents a hyperlink from the containing resource to a URI.

deprecation.description:
<para>The "deprecation" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its presence indicates that the link is to be deprecated (i.e.
            removed) at a future date.  Its value is a URL that SHOULD provide
            further information about the deprecation.
            A client SHOULD provide some notification (for example, by logging a
            warning message) whenever it traverses over a link that has this
            property.  The notification SHOULD include the deprecation property's
            value so that a client maintainer can easily find information about
            the deprecation.</para>

href.description:
<para>The "href" property is REQUIRED.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is either a URI [RFC3986] or a URI Template [RFC6570].
            If the value is a URI Template then the Link Object SHOULD have a
            "templated" attribute whose value is true.</para>

hreflang.description:
<para>The "hreflang" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string and is intended for indicating the language of
            the target resource (as defined by [RFC5988]).</para>

name.description:
<para>The "name" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value MAY be used as a secondary key for selecting Link Objects
            which share the same relation type.</para>

profile.description:
<para>The "profile" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string which is a URI that hints about the profile.</para>

templated.description:
<para>The "templated" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is boolean and SHOULD be true when the Link Object's "href"
            property is a URI Template.
            Its value SHOULD be considered false if it is undefined or any other
            value than true.</para>

title.description:
<para>The "title" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string and is intended for labelling the link with a
            human-readable identifier (as defined by [RFC5988]).</para>

type.description:
<para>The "type" property is OPTIONAL.</para>
<para> </para>
<para>Its value is a string used as a hint to indicate the media type
            expected when dereferencing the target resource.</para>

Room.description: Represents a room for a property.

amenities.description: Provides a collection of amenities for the room.

beddings.description: Provides information about available beds in the room.

expected_occupancy.description: The usual amount of persons for the room.

extra_bed_allowed.description: Extra bed allowed in the room.

locations.description: Provides a collection of locations for the room.

max_persons.description: Maximum number of allowed persons in the room.

min_persons.description: Minimum number of allowed persons in the room.

room_type.description:
Room type of the room.
            
            Contains only the basic properties of the room type.

views.description: Provides a collection of views for the room.

count.description: Amount of available beds of the specified bedding type

type.description: The type of bed for the room type

maintenance.description: Provides information about current room maintenance status.

RoomType.description: Represent a room type for a property

amenities.description: Provides a collection of amenities for the room type

bedding_type.description: The type of bed for the room type

description.description: Provides a description of the room type

expected_occupancy.description: The usual amount of persons for the room type

facilities.description: Provides a collection of facilities for the room type

max_persons.description: The maximum amount of persons for the room type

min_persons.description: The minimum amount of persons for the room type

views.description: Provides a collection of views for the room type

200.description: An array of hotels for each of the hotels listed in the hetras-hotels parameter.

500.description: We couldn't return the representation due to an internal server error.

get.summary: Get a list with the details of all the hotels specified.

get.description:
Based on the url parameter hotelId the API evaluates if the client making the request is allowed to access the data and 
            returns 403 if the client is not subscribed to that hotel.
